title: Jamaica secures $6.7bn for hurricane recovery and reconstruction plan
description: Up to $3.6bn in government financing included, with major contributions from global financial institutions.
content:
Jamaica has secured up to $6.7bn in support from international agencies to fund reconstruction over the next three years in the wake of Hurricane Melissa in October.
Melissa, one of the strongest st… [+1779 chars]
de: Jamaika sichert sich 6,7 Milliarden US-Dollar für den Wiederherstellungs- und Wiederaufbauplan nach Hurrikan. Darin sind bis zu 3,6 Milliarden US-Dollar an Staatsfinanzierungen enthalten, mit erheblichen Beiträgen von globalen Finanzinstituten.
en: Jamaica secures $6.7bn for hurricane recovery and reconstruction plan. Up to $3.6bn in government financing included, with major contributions from global financial institutions.
la: Jamaica $6.7bn ad consilium recuperandae et instaurationis procellae tutatur. Usque ad $3.6bn in regimine nummarias comprehendit, cum maioribus contributionibus ex global oeconomicis institutis.

title: Hurricane season is over. Here’s why the US never got hit.
description: For the first time in a decade, the country avoided landfall, thanks to an atmospheric anomaly. But this hurricane season was exceptional in other bad ways, too.
content: Back in April, scientists read the tea leaves or, more accurately, heaps of data and predicted an above-average hurricane season over the summer and autumn, with nine or 10 named storms, four of whic… [+4414 chars]
de: Die Hurrikansaison ist vorbei. Aus diesem Grund wurden die USA nie getroffen. Zum ersten Mal seit einem Jahrzehnt konnte das Land dank einer atmosphärischen Anomalie die Landung vermeiden. Aber diese Hurrikansaison war auch in anderer Hinsicht außergewöhnlich.
en: Hurricane season is over. Here’s why the US never got hit.. For the first time in a decade, the country avoided landfall, thanks to an atmospheric anomaly. But this hurricane season was exceptional in other bad ways, too.
la: Procellae tempus desinit. Hic est cur US numquam percussum est.. Primum in decennium terra land ruinae vitavit, per anomalia atmosphaerica. Sed hoc tempestatis tempus in aliis quoque malis eximium fuit.

title: Jamaica’s Tourism Faces Long Recovery After Hurricane Melissa Shuts at least 26 Resorts
description: Hurricane Melissa, the strongest storm to hit Jamaica in more than 30 years, made landfall in late October and forced the closure of at least 26 resorts, Two months after the Jamaica hurricane, 26 resorts remain closed and the island’s peak tourism season is …
content: Hurricane Melissa, the strongest storm to hit Jamaica in more than 30 years, made landfall in late October and forced the closure of at least 26 resorts, wiping out months of peak-season bookings and… [+746 chars]
de: Jamaikas Tourismus steht vor einer langen Erholung, nachdem Hurrikan Melissa mindestens 26 Resorts geschlossen hat. Hurrikan Melissa, der stärkste Sturm, der Jamaika seit mehr als 30 Jahren heimgesucht hat, traf Ende Oktober auf Land und erzwang die Schließung von mindestens 26 Resorts. Zwei Monate nach dem Hurrikan auf Jamaika bleiben 26 Resorts geschlossen und die Hochsaison für den Tourismus auf der Insel ist …

title: Western Cuba faces blackout as government seeks to update energy grid
description: Electrical failures due to ageing infrastructure, hurricanes and a struggling economy have prompted widespread protests.
content:
Cuba has suffered another blackout that temporarily knocked out power to the western side of the Caribbean island, a region that includes the capital Havana.
The countrys Ministry of Energy and Mine… [+4869 chars]
de: Im Westen Kubas droht ein Stromausfall, da die Regierung versucht, das Energienetz zu modernisieren. Stromausfälle aufgrund alternder Infrastruktur, Wirbelstürme und eine angeschlagene Wirtschaft haben zu weit verbreiteten Protesten geführt.
en: Western Cuba faces blackout as government seeks to update energy grid. Electrical failures due to ageing infrastructure, hurricanes and a struggling economy have prompted widespread protests.
la: Western Cubae nigram spectat ut regimen energiae energiae renovandae quaerit. Defectus electricae propter infrastructuram senescentis, turbinum et oeconomiae luctantium latissime protestationes concitaverunt.

title: Floods and Landslides in Indonesia Kill over 800
description:
Indonesian officials said on Tuesday that the death toll from flooding and landslides, caused by months of heavy rain and multiple devastating typhoons, has exceeded 800. More than 700 of those casualties were reported on the island of Sumatra.

de:
Überschwemmungen und Erdrutsche in Indonesien fordern über 800 Todesopfer. Indonesische Beamte sagten am Dienstag, dass die Zahl der Todesopfer durch Überschwemmungen und Erdrutsche, die durch monatelange Starkregenfälle und mehrere verheerende Taifune verursacht wurden, 800 überschritten habe. Mehr als 700 dieser Opfer wurden auf der Insel Sumatra gemeldet.

la:

title: Senyar Swamps Sumatra
description: A rare tropical cyclone dropped torrential rains on the Indonesian island, fueling extensive and destructive floods.
content: Tropical cyclones almost never form over the Strait of Malacca. The narrow waterway separating Peninsular Malaysia from the Indonesian island of Sumatra sits so close to the equator that the Coriolis… [+3050 chars]
de: Senyar-Sümpfe Sumatra. Ein seltener tropischer Wirbelsturm löste auf der indonesischen Insel heftige Regenfälle aus, die zu ausgedehnten und zerstörerischen Überschwemmungen führten.
en: Senyar Swamps Sumatra. A rare tropical cyclone dropped torrential rains on the Indonesian island, fueling extensive and destructive floods.
la: Senyar paludum Sumatra. Rara cyclo tropica imbres torrentes in Indonesiaca insula decidit, amplas et perniciosas inundationes fovet.

description: U.S. Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem thanked President Donald Trump for an uneventful 2025 hurricane season in the U.S., saying, "You kept the hurricanes away."
content:

U.S. Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem thanked President Donald Trump for an uneventful 2025 hurricane season in the U.S., saying, "You kept the hurricanes away."
A rumor that circulat… [+4888 chars]
de: Hat Kristi Noem Trump wirklich dafür gedankt, dass er Hurrikane ferngehalten hat? US-Heimatschutzministerin Kristi Noem dankte Präsident Donald Trump für eine ereignislose Hurrikansaison 2025 in den USA und sagte: „Sie haben die Hurrikane ferngehalten.“
en: Did Kristi Noem genuinely thank Trump for keeping hurricanes away?. U.S. Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem thanked President Donald Trump for an uneventful 2025 hurricane season in the U.S., saying, "You kept the hurricanes away."
la: Utrum Kristi Noem vere gratias BUCINUM pro custodia turbinum auferet?. US Secretarius Patriae Securitatis Kristi Noem Praesidi Donald Trump gratias egit pro tempore opportuno MMXXV in Americae, dicens "Tu procellas abiecisti".

title: What happens when no hurricanes hit the Gulf? Texas just found out.
description: We learned a lot about the weather this year.
content:
It has been a decade since an Atlantic hurricane season came and went-June 1 through Nov. 30-without a major storm making landfall on U.S. shores. That hardly means it was a quiet season.
In weather… [+5014 chars]
de: Was passiert, wenn keine Hurrikane den Golf treffen? Texas hat es gerade herausgefunden. Wir haben dieses Jahr viel über das Wetter gelernt.
en: What happens when no hurricanes hit the Gulf? Texas just found out.. We learned a lot about the weather this year.
la: Quid accidit, cum nullum turbinum sinum attingunt? Texas sicut invenimus.. Multa de tempestate hoc anno didicimus.
